meta.title: Create Invitation
meta.description: You can invite a user to your Organization through this page.
meta.keywords: invite, create invitation, invite, invite user, do not invite user

info.email: The user's e-mail address registered in turistikrota. If the user is not registered in turistikrota, the invited user will register in turistikrota with this e-mail address.
info.locale: The invitation email will be sent to the user in this language.

success: The invitation was sent successfully. The invited user will receive an invitation to their email address and must accept your invitation within 24 hours.
